info.name: Moank Factoring API
info.description: Draft API The Moank Factoring API can be used by Moank's partners in order to provide financial products to their end customers within their own application/website. # Sequence Diagrams **Onboarding Creditor** ![Sequence Diagram](./specifications/factoring/creditor-onboarding.svg) **Onboarding Debtor** ![Sequence Diagram](./specifications/factoring/debtor-onboarding.svg) **Transfer Claim** ![Sequence Diagram](./specifications/factoring/factoring.svg)

item.name: Get list of settlement details for payouts

query.description: A cursor for use in pagination. The counting convention starts from 0. It defines your place in the list. For instance, if start is 50 and there are 100 objects in the system, you will receive 50 objects (50-99).

A cursor for use in pagination. It defines the size of the list. For instance, if _page is 20, start is 20 and there are 100 objects in the system, you will receive 20 objects (20-39). The maximun value for a page is 25.

request.description: Used to fetch the list of details for payouts to the creditor. The list is sorted with the most recent payouts first.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: basic

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: basic

request.description: Used to add a new creditor into the system. The Moank service will process it and set the business terms for it. By "creditor" is meant the current creditor of the claim before the transfer of the claim to Moank. Moank is buying the claim from the creditor. Creditors are usually merchants or other financers that issued the claim in the first place.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: basic

query.description: A cursor for use in pagination. The counting convention starts from 0. It defines your place on the list. For inscance, if start is 50 and there are 100 objects returned from the request, you will receive 50 objects (50-99).

A cursor for use in pagination. It defines the number of items fetched. For instance, if _start is 10, _page is also 10 and there are 100 objects returned from the request, you will receive 10 objects (10-19). The maximum _page size allowed is 20.
A filter for use in querying. It queries creditors on their nationalIdentifier.
A filter for use in querying. It queries creditors on their alias.
A filter for use in querying. It queries creditors on their name.
